org-relationship-vocab
======================

**Competitor** (C)

    Org1 and Org2 compete with each for the same customers

**Parent** (P)

    Org1 is a parent company to Org2

**Subsidiary** (S)

    Org1 is a subsidiary (child company) to Org2

**Vendor** (V)

    Org1 provides goods, materials, or services to Org2 on a contractual basis

**Trusted Business Partner** (T)

    A trusted business partner is an organization or individual that has an alliance (contractually, bonded, etc.) with the victim organization

**Other** (O)

    Other type of relationship not described by this vocabulary
